title: A mix of small and capital letters :D
content:
Hi, everybody.  
Long ago I did a powerpoint photography course but now I want to update some things... I realised I don't have this font. I think it's written in capital letters. If anyone know about it... :P I will be very pleased. Have a nice day!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_5895.Cuerpo%20c%C3%A1mara.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2_5788.Balance%20Blancos.jpg)

author: Guillemon

comments.content: The most common term for this kind of typeface (or typeface treatment) is “unicase”.
